category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_Upload_Company_ID
preference.preference_description: Specifies the Company ID which is saved on the last item revision/ takes the value from IMDS_Own_Company_IDs. This preference is used when uploading to imds.
